description: This request for proposal is for the purchase of various REMUS parts.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: REMUS Parts

#### Reference Number: cb-7542-16526122

**Public Document Notice**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of various parts for REMUS vehicles, solicitation number W8482-241758/A.

**Contracting Entity**

* Name: National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
* Contact Person: Christopher Cauchi
* Contact Information: [christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.cauchi), (555) 555-5555 (telephone)

**Tender Description**

This RFP calls for the supply of the following items to support the REMUS program:

* Aileron/Stabilizer (Part No.: 101878-1)
* Knob (Part No.: 150438)
* Bearing Unit, Plain (Part No.: 15-001)
* Tape, Reflective (Part No.: 21-055)
* Hardware Kit, Mechanic Equipment (Part No.: 150432)
* 3 Function Switch (Part No.: 165273)
* Purge Port; End Cap; 7/16-20; Low Profile (Part No.: 23-249)
* O-Ring; 2-015; BUNA N (Part No.: 25-015)
* Magnet Slide; 3 Function Switch (Part No.: 165320)
* Sensor; Transducer; BT-2RCL (Part No.: 60-220)
* Switch, Function (Part No.: 165321/A)
* Vehicle Handle; 7.50 In Diam.; 130LB Limit (Part No.: 165183-01)
* R-100 Nose W/ Floatation; Black (Part No.: 165879-01)
* Service Cradle; Notched; R100; 20.0 In (Part No.: 166694-20.00)
* Ballast, End, 0.20LBS (Part No.: 166406)
* Fin; REMUS Vehicule; Yellow (Part No.: 101878-3)
* Ballast, End, 0.50LBS (Part No.: 166405)
* Antenna, L1/L2, W/ Strobe; R100, Orange (Part No.: 168186-06)

#### Submission Guidelines

* B
